note.p: Daughter of Helen Biggs Taylor and her husband, Thomas Taylor, owner of a large cotton-spinning business in Wigan, Lancashire. Never married; lived with her mother and sister.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/2767/75/15), 1911 (RG14/406)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 May 2021)
